trans-unit.source: Represents a try/catch/finally/fault block.
The body block is protected by the try block.
The handlers consist of a set of <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.CatchBlock> expressions that can be either catch statements or filters.
The fault block runs if an exception is thrown.
The finally block runs regardless of how control exits the body.
Only one of fault or finally blocks can be supplied.
The return type of the try block must match the return type of any associated catch statements.
Gets the <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.Expression"></xref> representing the body of the try block.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.Expression"></xref> representing the body of the try block.
Gets the <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.Expression"></xref> representing the fault block.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.Expression"></xref> representing the fault block.
Gets the <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.Expression"></xref> representing the finally block.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.Expression"></xref> representing the finally block.
Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.CatchBlock"></xref> expressions associated with the try block.
The collection of <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.CatchBlock"></xref> expressions associated with the try block.
Returns the node type of this <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.Expression"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType"></xref> that represents this expression.
Gets the static type of the expression that this <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.Expression"></xref> represents.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression.Type"></xref> that represents the static type of the expression.
Creates a new expression that is like this one, but using the supplied children.
If all of the children are the same, it will return this expression.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression.Body"></xref> property of the result.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression.Handlers"></xref> property of the result.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression.Finally"></xref> property of the result.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.TryExpression.Fault"></xref> property of the result.
This expression if no children are changed or an expression with the updated children.
